author: Amazon Customer

review: This has virtually replaced my Roku and my ChromeCast.  My only complaint with this is the reason it can't fully replace those devices yet.  Amazon allows for Netflix and Hulu, which is great, but they don't allow for other competing products.  I have movies I've bought in TargetTicket, VUDU (because of buying DVDs at WalMart) and freebies from Google Play Movies, but none of these apps are available on the FireTV platform.  If I could access all of my media, then it's be 4+ stars, but the walled garden/no competitors thing is a big drag.
